articles.description: Down 2-0 in the Western finals to the Nuggets, the Lakers' LeBron James and Anthony Davis vowed the team will bounce back with the series shifting to L.A.
articles.content: DENVER -- LeBron James missed all six of his 3-pointers -- including an 0-for-3 mark in the fourth quarter to extend his streak of 19 straight 3s he has failed to convert in the fourth this postseaso… [+4263 chars]

articles.title: "Sometimes Iraqis just support a person” – Cristiano Ronaldo’s Al-Nassr shirt sales skyrocket in Iraq, sports store assistant explains reason - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Jassim Khedhyr, a sales assistant at a sports store in Baghdad, has revealed that Iraqi football fans love Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi.
articles.content: Jassim Khedhyr, a sales assistant at a sports store in Baghdad, has revealed that Iraqi football fans love Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi. He claims that the fans love buying kits of the clubs th… [+2231 chars]

articles.author: Pritish Raj
articles.title: Sudirman Cup disappointment a bitter pill but temporary blip: HS Prannoy - The Bridge
articles.description: Star shuttler HS Prannoy said that the Indian team's disappointing show at the Sudirman Cup will only be a blip on the way because of the strong team spirit.
articles.content: HS Prannoy termed the Sudirman Cup defeat as a hard pill to swallow but said that there were positives to be taken by the Indian badminton team and that the culture within the team ensures that this … [+3593 chars]

articles.title: Erik Lamela scores for Sevilla as they qualify for Europa League final - mundoalbiceleste.com
articles.description: Erik Lamela scored for Sevilla as they qualified for the Europa League final. Lamela was the hero for Sevilla with his goal in extra time. Juventus took a 1-0 lead against Sevilla in the semi finals of the Europa League and Suso would draw Sevilla level as th…
articles.content:
